page.title: 18THINGS TO DO FOR CHILDREN
page.content: What can children do in Ludlow ? Here is a list done by 9-10year olds. Summer holiday playscheme. Cubs and Beavers for boys,Brownies for girls. Climbing trees and fishing in the river. Tadpoles and Dolphin clubs for Swimming. BMX track for cycle racing. Making camps in the woods and on Whitcliffe. Horse riding at North farm. Playing Poohsticks on the river bridges. Having a go on the Adventure playground. Hide and seek around the castle. Rugby practice and football on the recreation ground. Watching T.V.
